name: Get To Top Of Tower But Its Rigged
name_original: Get To Top Of Tower But Its Rigged
description:
At the start, don't forget to click on the game so the movement keys work...

Press A and D keys or Left and Right arrows to move...

Use the Mouse position to aim the sledgehammer...

Head right and fling yourself outside of the window to climb...

Credit to my sister for the extremely high-quality music and help on the creation of the games ultra-realistic assets.
